thread.title: Two journalists killed while covering storm

title: Two journalists killed while covering storm
text:
Two journalists killed while covering storm 00:47
A television news anchor and a camera operator were killed on Monday when a tree fell on their vehicle as they were covering subtropical storm Alberto in North Carolina. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A television news anchor and a camera operator were killed on Monday when a tree fell on their vehicle as they were covering subtropical storm Alberto in North Carolina. Colette Luke has more.
